title: "Free Artificial Intelligence Bootcamp for high school students coming to Boyle Heights"
excerpt: "The Mark Cuban Foundation will hold one of 30 Artificial Intelligence bootcamps for underserved high school students in Boyle Heights this fall. According to a press release, the free AI Bootcamp in Boyle Heights will introduce students in grades 9-12 to basic AI concepts and skills."
